asistencia.asistenciaInfo: It is recommended to have the following information at hand before requesting a roadside assistance service:
asistencia.asistenciaTel: In the event that you require Roadside Assistance within the United States of America you should call:
asistencia.asistenciaTelTwo: Long distance within the USA and Canada:
asistencia.asistenciaServiciosDesc: Here you can consult the road assistance services that we offer.
asistencia.asistenciaImportanteDesc: All coverage up to a maximum of $100.00 dollars, granting 1 service in policies from 1 to 179 days and 2 services in semi-annual and annual policies.
asistencia.asistenciaImportanteSpan: Exclusive service within the United States and Canada.
asistencia.asistenciaRsa: For any other inquiries, please contact us at:

accidente.accidenteDescOne: In the United States and Canada, it is mandatory to have unlimited liability insurance coverage for all vehicles traveling on their roads.
accidente.accidenteDescTwo: If we are involved in an accident in the USA, there are a series of steps that we must follow to report the accident:
accidente.accidenteImportanteDesc: The adjuster in the United States does not go to the place of the accident. Everything is reported via telephone or also online, depending on the seriousness and type of loss, the company will determine the procedure to follow. In the event that our policyholders receive a claim or lawsuit, they should notify their insurance agent or National Unity Insurance Company of any demand, subpoena or information they know of. Remember that your policy only covers cars and pick-ups for private use NOT intended for transportation and with Mexican and/or border license plates.
accidente.accidentePasos: Steps to follow to report a loss in the USA:
accidente.accidentePasosOne: Notify the police of the accident by calling 911.
accidente.accidentePasosTwo: Obtain the essential data of the driver concerned:
accidente.accidentePasosThree: Report the accident through our online form or by calling the following telephone numbers:
accidente.accidentePasosThreeUnder: Check the correct dialing when calling the telephone numbers if you are not in the USA.
accidente.accidentePasosFour: Take pictures of the accident. Everything relevant for proper documentation.
accidente.accidenteImportanteFooter: Remember to keep the following information in hand in order to correctly report any loss:
accidente.accidenteImportanteFooter1: Name of the insured and the affected driver
accidente.accidenteImportanteFooter3: Contact number in Mexico and the United States
accidente.accidenteImportanteFooter4: Place and time of the accident

moto.motoDesc: Coverage for non-resident private motorcycles, designed to cover liability for damages caused to third parties in property and persons while circulating in the United States of America.

premium.premiumItems: The perfect complement for those who already have a primary coverage tourist policy.
premium.premiumModalDesc: Leave us your details for an agent to help you with your quotation

carro.carroDesc: Coverage for non-resident private automobiles, designed to cover liability for damages caused to third parties in property and persons while driving in the United States of America and Canada.
carro.carroAsistencia: Enhance your coverage with Plus Assistance
carro.carroAsistenciaDesc: What does Plus Assistance cover? It is a protection that complements your need to travel safely in the United States.
carro.carroAsistenciaEtiqueta: Buy your insurance and add Plus Assistance at the end!
carro.coberturaSplitDesc: It is a SPLIT coverage for Third Party Liability or damage to third parties, divided into bodily injury, accident and property damage.
carro.coberturaLucDesc1: It is a coverage of Civil Liability or damages to third parties with Combined Single Limit (CUL), per event in damages to property and persons.
carro.coberturaLucDesc2: This coverage can be used up to $100,000 USD free of limitations for bodily injury or property damage.
carro.coberturaLucDesc3: Applies to any U.S. entry status you select.

camion.camionDesc: Coverage for trucks, designed to cover liability for damages caused to third parties in property and persons while traveling in the United States of America.
camion.camionTrucker: Enhance your coverage with Trucker Plus.
camion.camionTruckerDesc: What is Trucker Plus? It is a protection that secures your driver.
camion.camionTruckerEtiqueta: Book your insurance and add Trucker Plus at the end!
camion.camionModalDesc: Leave us your details for an agent to help you with your quotation

longterm.longtermDesc: If you are going to study, work or visit your family in the USA for extended periods of time, contract your insurance with us.
longterm.coberturaSplitDesc: It is a SPLIT coverage for Third Party Liability or damage to third parties, divided into bodily injury, accident and property damage. We offer coverage throughout the United States, meeting the minimum limits required by each state.
longterm.coberturaLucDesc1: It is a coverage of Civil Liability or damages to third parties with Combined Single Limit (CUL), per event in damages to property and persons.
longterm.coberturaLucDesc2: This coverage can be used up to $100,000 USD free of limitations for bodily injury or property damage.
longterm.coberturaLucDesc3: Your coverage exceeds the limit required by all US states, we cover a maximum of $100,000 USD per event in damages to third parties.
longterm.coberturaLucDesc4: Applies to any U.S. entry status you select.
longterm.longtermBeneficiosDesc: By contracting our Civil Liability (CR) insurance, in addition to giving you peace of mind, we offer you the following benefits:

rental.rentalDesc: Save up to 40% buying with us your insurance for third party damages in a rented car in the USA.
rental.rentalPasos: How to use our rental car insurance in USA
rental.rentalPasosDesc: Here are the steps to follow to successfully purchase insurance for the car you will be renting.
rental.rentalPasosListoDesc: You already saved up to 40% on the premium paid.
rental.rentalCoberturaDesc: This coverage exceeds the limit required by all US states, we cover $100,000 USD LUC per event in damages to third parties in their property and/or persons.

card.cardDesc1: Acquire it today and activate it when you need it from wherever you are.
card.coberturaSplitDesc: It is a SPLIT coverage for Third Party Liability or damage to third parties, divided into bodily injury, accident and property damage. We offer coverage throughout the United States, meeting the minimum limits required by each state.

agentes.agentesDesc1: Through our agents we offer you a close and personalized service.
agentes.agentesDesc2: Select the agent you prefer, all of them will offer you the full benefits of the coverage and service you choose in your quote.
